DOC.brief_summary: To see fast much physical training reduce risk factor relate metabolic syndrome
DOC.criteria: insulin resistance , impair glucose tolerance type 2diabetes , include two following factor : Blood pressure ≥ 140/90 mm Hg , Triglycerides Fasting ≥ 1,7 mmol/l , and/or low HDLcholesterol ( ≤ 0,9 mmol/l men , ≤ 1,0 mmol/l woman ) Obesity , Waisthip ratio ≥ 0,9 men , ≥ 0,85 woman BMI ( body mass index ) ≥ 30 kg/m2 Microalbuminuria ( albumin secretion ≥ 20 mg/l 20 200 g per minute )
